content:
(Reposting here what I sent to the Discord)

Hello, for "find references" I noticed a bit of discussion on this issue from november: https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/issues/200

I am wondering if anything has advanced on that front. Is it ever planned to be implemented?
It's planed, but not yet implemented. I've filed https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/issues/1622 which describes how the issue should be handled
@matklad Thank you for the update and filing the issue. I might (or might not) try to work on this during my free time.
